messages.content: Jessica Butler works with Edward Alexander.
Edward Alexander is a colleague of David Long.
David Long works with Lawrence Johnson.
Lawrence Johnson is a colleague of Rebecca Ellis.
Rebecca Ellis works with Wayne Stevens.
Wayne Stevens is a colleague of Martha Ramirez.
Martha Ramirez works with Jonathan Roberts.
Jonathan Roberts is a colleague of Shirley Ramos.
Shirley Ramos works with Jean Rivera.
Jean Rivera is a colleague of Danielle Jackson.

queries.question: Are Jessica Butler and Danielle Jackson related to each other at work through colleagues relations?

reference_answer.text: Yes, they are indirect colleagues according to their graph relations.
